channel.title: Chance's Cooking Blog!
channel.description: A simple, beautiful theme for Jekyll that emphasizes content rather than aesthetic fluff.

item.title: Here's a recipe!
item.description:
Blog post

Heyo guys, its me Chance again. Things are getting pretty busy at the organization where I work (don’t ask, I can’t tell you where), so that’s why it’s been a while. Here’s one of my favorite latke recipes! http://chal-host.chals.mcpshsf.com/challenge.docx

item.title: Welcome to My Blog!
item.description:
Blog post

Hi all, and welcome to my blog!! In case you didn’t know, my name is Chance and I am a HUGE latke enthusiast! Here, I’ll be posting some recipes, tips and tricks, and the best places to buy latkes. Enjoy! stmzw://orbfi.rohqpp.chw/jtlx/n/1wwajg-oxyzriixnf12c09cjc_lpglsxd/gixg?ydp=lrecigqjwaz{p0pw0w_mr3_ycl!}
